product_name: Superfeet Copper DMP Premium Insoles - Low to Medium Volume
long_description: Superfeet Copper DMP premium insoles use a passive molding process to shape the insoles to your feet, providing a custom, supportive platform underfoot. Multiple layers of material work to support feet while a dynamic, impressionable foam molds to the shape of your feet without compromising stability or cushioning. Molding does not require the use of an external heat source-simply slide the Copper DMP insoles into your shoes and the they conform to your feet as you use them. 3/4-length polypropylene heel caps cradle heels, stabilize feet and provide arch support; reinforced midfoot area helps maintain midfoot flexibility. Smooth nylon topsheets help reduce friction and hot spots, and are treated with AgION(TM) antimicrobial treatment to help control odor. Recommended for low-impact activites; low profile makes these well suited to casual or tighter-fitting shoes. Superfeet Copper DMP premium insoles accommodate all arch types, though are ideal for low- to medium-arch feet.
short_description: Superfeet Copper DMP premium insoles use a passive molding process to shape the insoles to your feet, providing a custom, supportive platform underfoot.
